main event: Two unidentified objects were observed over Bermuda for approximately 20 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a 'twin star with ring around it' appearance, about the size of a US penny (2.5 inches).
The objects were bluish-white in color and were observed both the previous night and the current night.
The objects appeared to pick up speed as they came closer, and would move slowly before suddenly shooting away.
The objects were observed 'zig-zagging' and getting smaller until they faded out.
The report mentions there have been several sightings of satellites in the area in the past few days.
